title: Episode 10: Why Feeling Alone Or Disconnected From Other People Means You’re Healing
description:
In this episode, we talk about how trauma can impact our relationships causing us to feel alone and disconnected from the world and others. You’ll learn why spending time alone can help you grow and connect with your true self. And, why feeling disconnected from other people creates an opportunity for you to find healthier, more fulfilling relationships.

Join the SelfHealers Circle Waitlist:

https://theholisticpsychologist.com/waitlist/

Text Nicole! 215-366-0012
